item.title: Fly Tipping mixed with poor street cleaning, 10th August
item.description:
The council has allowed MHO on Castillon Road in multiple houses, ( I have no issues with this apart from some of them house people with know problems which mean they don't naturally look after the surrounding areas - people have to live somewhere) however the council fails to take monies from these landlords to clear the streets leading to litter and then fly Tipping on side road, you can walk down and dumping of household waste that will cause fire next to my wooden fencing and property which this is evidence of and council will be liable for damages

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wingrove Road, Downham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken ay equipment, 10th August
